attributes.action: Ban Google Streetview in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Google are invading the privacy of our homes and children by taking pictures and video recordings in every street of the UK for their Street view service.

Whilst they claim they are recording in public only, the quality of their imagines have shown to be more than capable of looking into peoples homes.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
